Method: The preparation process of carried out in three phases. First: «Brainstorming» that was open all = strongly disagree to 9 = strongly agree). Those with an average score greater than 8 accepted (provided that at of the participants had given them a score 7), and a second consultation was made for the recommendations with an average score between 6 and 8. Third: Writing and creating a consensus of the final document was done. Result: A total of 11 proposals were initially accepted, and four obtained a doubtful average score (between 6 and 8). After the second consultation, the list was made up of eight recommendations. Two refer to general management, four to gastrointestinal decontamination techniques, and two to the administration of antidotes.
